name: ATM BOOTH Aceess
describtion: We have ATM BOOTH beside our hospital.It is open for 24hour.You can access your card any time.

name: Cafeteria Service 24x7
describtion: Cafetria is open for you where you will get healthy and tasty food.You can check in anytime

name: Standard clean Service
describtion: We always ensure to keep clean and neat our hospital to fight against virus.We provides UK method clean service.

name: Roof-top Garden
describtion: To give you fresh air and environment we arranged garden in roof top.There is a particuler time where you can visit.

name: Pharmecy Service 24-h
describtion: Pharmecy is open for you 24x7.You can buy any medicine at any time.We always try to provide you neccessery things

name: Prayer Rooms
describtion: We have seperated prayer rooms for men and women and also have attached washroom.You can use this room at any time.

name: Waiting Area
describtion: We arranged a well furnished and clean with facilities room.So that You can wait until you called

name: Free wifi
describtion: We have wifi service where you can get free access with 15Mbps
